item.title: BC-97 South Approaching Customs - Port of Oroville
item.description: BC-97 South approaching Customs - Port of Oroville. All traffic beyond this sign must report to US Customs.

item.title: BC-97 South Approaching Customs
item.description: Customs / Douanes in 300 meters stop ahead. Approaching the US-Canada border at Port of Oroville.

item.title: BC-3 West (Crowsnest Highway) at BC-97
item.description: BC-3 West (Crowsnest Highway) at BC-97 in Osoyoos. Use BC-97 north for Oliver and Penticton. Use BC-97 south for US Border and Oroville (Washington).

item.title: BC-3 West at BC-97
item.description: BC-3 West (Crowsnest Highway) at BC-97 in Osoyoos. Continue west on BC-3 for Keremeos and Vancouver.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-97
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-97 in Osoyoos. Continue east on BC-3 for Rock Creek and Grand Forks.

item.title: TC-1 East Exit 374
item.description: TC-1 East/BC-5 North approaching Exit 374, BC-5 North/Jasper, 500 metres.

item.title: TC-1 East Exit 399
item.description: TC-1 East/BC-97 South approaching Exit 399, BC-97 South/Vernon, 600 metres.

item.title: TC-1 East/BC-5 North Kamloops
item.description: TC-1 east BC-5A/Hillside Ave/Columbia Street (Exit 368), and TC-1/BC-97/BC-5 Thru Traffic overhead.
